name: MadGunnerKanojo
description:
Mad Gunner Kanojo for PC

you play as the girl, with a shotgun

Shoot to move by clicking on the screen

Gravity applies be careful!

Don't fall in lava and don't let enemies or traps kill you!

Full Version available on Play Store!

MadGunnerKanojo Mobile

The mobile version includes:

-Moon Level

-Skin customization

-Continue button
